best_candidate.name: ClippedMarginBradleyTerryLoss
best_candidate.theoretical_basis: A Bradley-Terry logistic preference model where the log-odds of preferring the winner are a function of a scaled log-probability difference minus an adaptive, cost-dependent margin. The log-probability difference is normalized by its batch standard deviation for scale invariance, and the margin is derived from the clipped z-score of the cost gap to ensure stability against outliers.
